meanings.sent1: After the rain, the sun reshined brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I reshined my shoes before the party to make them look nice.
meanings.sent3: The little girl reshined her toy car with a big smile on her face.
meanings.sent4: His enthusiasm for the project reshined like a beacon in the team meeting.
meanings.sent5: The diamond reshined with a dazzling sparkle after being cleaned.

meanings.sent1: The cleaner reshined the silverware until it gleamed.
meanings.sent2: She reshined the trophy to present it at the award ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The magician reshined the coin to amaze the audience with his trick.
meanings.sent4: Her smile reshined the room brighter than any lamp.
meanings.sent5: The car wash reshined the vehicle to look brand new.
